title: Oat and chocolate chip cookies
ingredients: ['110g butter', '110g dark brown soft sugar', '100g caster sugar', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '60g plain flour', '60g wholemeal flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '160g porridge oats', '85g plain chocolate chips', '60g chopped walnuts', '60g Grape-Nuts cereal']
